turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey would you mind going online to Peets and getting me a coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, I can do that. Let me look for the closest one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think there is one right near the hotel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The closest Peets is 1749 Massachusetts Avenue in Lexington, MA

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's the exact one. Hold on let me figure out what I want.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Last time you ordered a White Chocolate Mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right. I think that's too sweet for me now though. I want something less sugary.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have a Sugar Free Vanilla Latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order it with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want a large?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, get me the large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's only 21 grams of sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good to know.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want anything else to go with the coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just get me the coffee. That's all I need.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm putting the order in right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your large Sugar Free Vanilla Latte with almond milk is almost ready for pick up. Peets is at 1749 Massachusetts Avenue Lexington, MA and the receipt will show up on your phone via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You're the best.
